sentences: He is noted for his work in the microhouse genre, reminiscent of indie electronic pop music of the early eighties and ambient techno from a decade on.
Isolée's 2000 album Rest, containing the hit "Beau Mot Plage", was arguably the first microhouse full-length.
Rajko Müller was born in Frankfurt, Germany but lived with his family in Algeria from the age of 7 to 12 and went to a French primary school.
Around that time, his parents bought an organ for Christmas and he and a school friend attempted to make some synthpop.
Müller's first Isolée material appeared on the music label Playhouse in 1997.
Müller has received wide acclaim, including being listed as the third-best reviewed album of the year on Metacritic for his 2005 album We Are Monster.
